## Project setup

- Clone project
- Create `.env`
  - see `sample.env`
- Paste discord bot token in `.env`
  - See [wiki](https://github.com/ewm-projects/lwm-discord/wiki/Discord-Bot-Setup)
- Run `docker compose up -d --build`
- type `$hello` in discord server
  - Bot should reply back with `Hello`
